meanings.definition: A tropical climbing plant with large trumpet-shaped flowers.
meanings.sent1: The bignonia in the garden has beautiful orange flowers.
meanings.sent2: I saw a bignonia with red flowers climbing up the wall.
meanings.sent3: The bignonia seemed to wave hello as I passed by.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter echoed through the room like the blooms of a bignonia.
meanings.sent5: The scent of the bignonia filled the air with sweetness.

meanings.definition: The wood of a bignonia tree.
meanings.sent1: The table was made of sturdy bignonia.
meanings.sent2: The craftsman carved a beautiful bowl from bignonia wood.
meanings.sent3: The bignonia wood whispered secrets of the forest.
meanings.sent4: His voice was as smooth as polished bignonia.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of bignonia wood filled the workshop.

meanings.definition: A genus of flowering plants in the family Bignoniaceae.
meanings.sent1: The bignonia genus includes many colorful flowers.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study the different species of bignonia.
meanings.sent3: The bignonia family reunion was a blooming success.
meanings.sent4: Her love for nature blossomed like a bignonia flower.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a tapestry of bignonia blooms.
